<template>

</template>

<script>
export default {
    props: {
        movie: {
            required: true,
        },
        genres: {
            required: true,
        }
    },
    computed: {
        posterPath(){
            return "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/" + this.movie.poster_path
        }
    },
    methods: {
        genretypeName(geraId, index){
            for(const item of this.genres){
                if(item.id == geraId){
                    if(this.movie.genre_ids.length - 1 == index){
                        return item.namel
                    }else{
                        return item.name + ",";
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
